attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i wanted to be more informed but now i’m just confused. as soon as i downloaded the app, ICE was at my door trying to deport me and my dad. I bet they found out we ate illegal through me downloading the app. anyways other than being deported, the app ain’t bad ✌🏼

attributes.title: So many bugs!!!
attributes.review: This app has soo many issues!! Every time I click on some it freezes and I have to close the app multiple times to get to a different tab!!! I would mark this -5 starts if I could!! #manny

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to keep up with what’s currently happening in the world. Although once I downloaded the app it glitched TERRIBLY and I was forced to delete it immediately. Y’all best fix this app and get your stuff together. Because this was a no from me.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤢🤢
attributes.review: currently throwing up because i opened this app to a ugly disgusting old man who looks like a cheeto🤮🤮now i have to pay thousand of dollars to got to therapy to try and recover from my ptsd from this image in my head. honestly tho i don’t think i can ever recover from this experience

attributes.title: sad
attributes.review: this app is so disappointing and disgusting 😞. I could never snd will never understand why this cheeto is the president of our country and why he has such a pointless and stupid app. I feel bad for the apple store for having to put up with this app, truly saddening.

attributes.title: This app is horrifying
attributes.review: I opened the app to find a blank orange screen. Then a ompaloompa showed up. i got so scared. then, when i proceeded to login it would keep kicking me off, until i finally fought back, and thumped it upside its head. i will never be downloading this app again i am TERRIFIED!

attributes.title: girl... what is this? 🤢😔
attributes.review: this app is disgusting... I don’t see how any one can BARE to have this on their home screens.... truly horrific. this app is filled with fake news and triggering information. i would say use at caution but DONT USE THIS AT ALL. DONT EVEN THINK ABOUT DOWNLOADING... unless you want to leave a scathing review like me 😌❣️

attributes.title: Couldn’t do anything
attributes.review: I opened the app and tried to click on anything and it wouldn’t let me and ended up freezing my phone for at least 10 mins til I was able to turn it off and back on. DO NOT DOWNLOAD it’s a waste

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: It asked me for my phone number which I feel is a threat to my national security quite disgusting, also I feel like there’s a lot of inappropriate content on this app that no human being should be able to see!

attributes.title: Unbelievably draining
attributes.review: For some reason every time i open this app i lose brain cells, I have now lost half of my brain capacity just looking at the spray painted orangutan at the front screen of the interface! Terribly annoying and horrible experience.
